subject: Tucson Shooting (2011)
Football
College Athletics
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: Officials for the Fiesta Bowl, which is hosting Bowl Championship Series title game in Glendale, Ariz., did not specify whether any additional security measures would be taken in the wake of the shooting.
snippet: Officials for the Fiesta Bowl, which is hosting Bowl Championship Series title game in Glendale, Ariz., did not specify whether any additional security measures would be taken in the wake of the shooting.
